title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Greenville has the higher money supply in Year 2 and/or does not explain that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Greenville has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Greenville has the higher money supply.

The response states that Greenville has the higher money supply in Year 2 and explains that using the quantity theory of money ( MV=PY MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaqGnbGaaeOvai aab2dacaqGqbGaaeywaaaa@3D16@ ), since the two nations have the same velocity of money and Greenville has a higher nominal GDP in Year 2, Greenville has the higher money supply.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Joescape experienced the higher real interest rate and/or does not explain that Joescape had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

The response states that Joescape experienced the higher real interest rate and explains that Joescape had lower inflation and the real interest rate is equal to the nominal interest rate minus the inflation rate.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that borrowers in Greenville will be better off and/or does not explain that the real value of loans that will be repaid will be lower than expected because the actual inflation rate is greater than the expected inflation rate.

The response states that borrowers in Greenville will be better off and explains that the real value of loans that will be repaid will be lower than expected because the actual inflation rate is greater than the expected inflation rate.
